summary: An orphan, whose father has been killed by dark power, attempts to bring justice back to the town.
cast: Sammo Kam-Bo Hung|Eddie Peng|Luodan Wang|Boran Jing|Jin Zhang|Cho-Lam Wong|Junjie Qin|Jiayi Feng|Byron Mann|Taiyu Gao|Tony Ka Fai Leung|Angelababy|Brian Siswojo|Phat Chan|Roy Hin Yeung Chow|Miroslav Karel|Mike Leeder|Stephen Rong
title: El renacer de una leyenda
